properties.name: threadpool.core-pool-size
properties.description: 线程池维护线程的最少数量

properties.name: threadpool.keep-alive-seconds
properties.description: 线程池维护线程所允许的空闲时间,默认为60s

properties.name: threadpool.max-pool-size
properties.description: 线程池维护线程的最大数量,默认为Integer.MAX_VALUE

properties.name: threadpool.queue-capacity
properties.description: 线程池所使用的缓冲队列,默认为Integer.MAX_VALUE

properties.name: threadpool.wait-for-tasks-to-complete-on-shutdown
properties.description: 等待所有任务结束后再关闭线程池
